sections.heading: PROCEDURE IN JURY TRIALSArt. 1791
sections.text: Comment on facts by judge prohibitedThe judge in the presence of the jury shall not comment upon the facts of the case, either by commenting upon or recapitulating the evidence, repeating the testimony of any witness, or giving an opinion as to what has been proved
